hotels.title: Five-Star Beachfront Mexico All-Suite Retreat near Puerto Vallarta with 10 Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Indulge in the serene elegance of this five-star retreat, nestled on the shimmering shores of Mexico's Riviera Nayarit. This beachfront haven offers a unique blend of modern luxury and authentic Mexican charm, with spacious suites, a world-class spa, a stunning multi-level pool and 10 restaurants and bars. Step outside the resort and you'll find yourself in the heart of Nuevo Vallarta, a vibrant town known for its beautiful marina, boutique shopping, and golf courses. Take a leisurely stroll along the palm-lined promenade, or explore the town's bustling farmers' markets.

hotels.vendor_name: Marival Distinct All-Inclusive Future Handwritten Collection
hotels.title: Mexico Nuevo Vallarta Beachfront Resort with Onsite Dining, Five Pools & Spa
hotels.description: Welcome to Marival Distinct Residences & Spa, the vacation jackpot where luxury living meets beachside bliss. Chow down at Omaggio Restaurant when you're feeling fancy, or grab ocean-view bites at Mozzamare Restaurant. Fancy a drink? Take your pick from the cool vibes at Lemmon Grass poolside to breathtaking sunset cocktails at Insú Sky Bar. Splash around in five jaw-dropping pools, or treat yourself to some pampering at Mélange World Spa. The little ones can run wild at the Kids' Club while teens can hang out in their own sweet spot. Squeeze in a workout at the top-notch fitness centre or kick back with a cold one at Brunello Bar. Nestled in the streets of Nuevo Nayarit, just steps from the ocean, Marival Distinct Residences & Spa - Handwritten Collection is a haven of relaxation.

hotels.vendor_name: Villa La Estancia Beach Resort & Spa Riviera Nayarit
hotels.title: Mexican Riviera Oceanfront Hacienda-Style Escape with Eight Restaurants
hotels.description: Perched on the golden shores of Flamingos Beach, perfectly situated between the vibrant Puerto Vallarta and the serene Riviera Nayarit, this resort offers an unparalleled Mexican Riviera experience. With a warm, inviting ambience and sophisticated amenities, it’s the ideal escape for relaxation and adventure. Lounge by the sparkling pool or stroll just a few steps to the gentle waves. Savour local and international flavours at the resort’s eight onsite restaurants and bars, indulge in soothing spa treatments and unwind in timeless hacienda-style accommodations. Beyond the resort, endless activities beckon - from horseback riding expeditions to thrilling marine adventures, all within easy reach.
